author: cms-patatrack
body:
This PR includes in a single commit all the Patatrack developments from the past 2-3 years.

There are few ongoing issues, but this is good enough to start making the actual PRs:
  - [x] drop the old heterogenous framework
  - [x] remove the usage of the CUDA API Wrappers
  - [x] update the code base to the latest 11.1.x developments (e.g. Pixel CPE changes)
  - [ ] integrate the ECAL work
  - [ ] integrate the HCAL work

I would ask all affected L2's to have a look at the changes in their packages, and suggest how they would like them to be split and organised.

Of course, any comments on the code itself are welcome !
title: [request for comment] Squash all Patatrack developments on top of CMSSW_11_1_0_pre4
